com.htsmart.wristband2.dfu

Class DfuManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.htsmart.wristband2.dfu.DfuManager

  • public class DfuManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Kilnn on 2017/6/7. Do Dfu Operation.

    And than get a DfuManager instance, call init() in Activity/Fragment onCreate() method.

    Call release() ()} in Activity/Fragment onDestroy() method.

    Call setDfuCallback(DfuCallback) monitor the dfu status and progress or an error.

    Call upgradeFirmware(String) to upgrade firmware. Call upgradeDial(String, byte) to upgrade dial.

      • start

        @Deprecated
public void start(java.lang.String uri,
                               boolean upgradeFirmware)
        Deprecated. Use upgradeFirmware(String) or upgradeDial(String, byte) instead.
        Start dfu with a file uri. Support uri scheme file:// 、content:// 、http:// 、https:// or a File Path.
        Parameters:
        uri - file uri
        upgradeFirmware - is firmware or dial ui upgrade.True for firmware,false for dial ui.

      • upgradeFirmware

        public void upgradeFirmware(java.lang.String uri)
        Start upgrade firmware with a uri. If your pass a url with this method, may be you app need network permission for download.
        Parameters:
        uri - Support uri scheme file:// 、content:// 、http:// 、https:// or a File Path.

      • upgradeDial

        public void upgradeDial(java.lang.String uri,
                        byte binFlag)
        Start upgrade dial with a uri. If your pass a url with this method, may be you app need network permission for download.
        Parameters:
        uri - Support uri scheme file:// 、content:// 、http:// 、https:// or a File Path.
        binFlag - If WristbandVersion.isExtDialMultiple() is false.This parameter is invalid. Use a value of 0. If WristbandVersion.isExtDialMultiple() is true.The flag value is obtained from DialSubBinInfo.getBinFlag()
        See Also:
        WristbandManager.requestDialBinInfo()

      • isCancelable

        public boolean isCancelable()
        Can the current upgrade process be cancelled. True for cancelable, false for not.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel dfu is the state isCancelable().
